description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows graphics component elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38079):

1. Download and apply the appropriate KB update based on your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 and 22H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
   - For other Windows 10 builds: [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)

2. Restart your system after the installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability which could potentially allow for elevation of privilege. 
- Ensure that your system is fully updated to the latest version to avoid potential security risks.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you are running a supported version of Windows.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
